original_text: But the people who were living in his country did not like the man. So they sent some of their people to the foreign country with a message. They said, “We do not want this man to rule over us.”
korean_text: 그런데 그 백성이 그를 미워하여 사자를 뒤로 보내어 이르되 우리는 이 사람이 우리의 왕 됨을 원하지 아니하나이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the people who were living in his country
So they sent some of their people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그들 중 일부 사람들을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: to the foreign country with a message
We do not want this man
